title: Care of the cardiac patient

description: Presents a complete case history of a typical cardiac patient from the initial attack and treatment to rehabilitation and return to a useful home life. The nursing care given to the patient includes comfort, rest, sleep, diet, feeding, elimination, cleanliness, and diversional and occupational therapy.
